entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
